duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct legal research, draft documents, and manage cases to support attorneys in their tasks.
Organize and manage case files, maintain accurate records, and facilitate communication between clients and attorneys.
Assist in drafting legal documents in criminal or traffic cases, and categorize documents during discovery processes.
File online filings in criminal and traffic cases, and provide general administrative support to the legal team.
Utilize legal software and technology for research, document management, and administrative tasks.

education_certification.credential: Associate degree or bachelor's degree in Paralegal Studies or related field.
Paralegal certification or relevant professional training is a plus.
Proven experience as a paralegal or legal assistant.
